title: BLEVE = Boiling liquid expansion vapourised explosion
creator_credit: Lawrence Rosenblum, National Fire Protection Association (U.S.) and Urban Image
brief_description: A fire safety and fire-fighting film about BLEVE - “Boiling Liquid Expansion Vapourised Explosion.” Includes several American newsclips dealing with large liquid petroleum gas cylinder fires.
creator_credit_for_label: Lawrence Rosenblum, National Fire Protection Association (U.S.) and Urban Image
